step_feedback.feedback: You did a good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow a little straighter to feel more resistance.
You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Focus on a strong, deliberate movement here.
Opening your hand wide and relaxing as you exhale is great. Ensure your fingers are spread as far as possible.
You're visualizing fluid being pumped out, which is excellent! Try to make your fist even tighter and your hand wider on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and make a tight fist as you breathe in. Then, open your hand wide as you breathe out to help move fluid.
